summary:
Al\'Thor gets his name from the protag of the Wheel of Time novels. And that\'s about where the similarities end.
He\'s a 2 handed swordsman, with a couple of perks included & can be found at the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/ms0rvk.jpg[/IMG]

Description:
Al\'Thor can be found at the Bannered Mare in Whiterun. He has no custom armor or weapons, he\'s only equipped with steel armor, gauntlets and boots, and a steel greatsword.
He specializes in 2 handed weapons, and levels up with the player, however, he is capped at 100.

He IS an imperial, it\'s just that I forgot to un-equip nouserheres ears /oops
Also, yes he is NAMED after Rand Al\'Thor from the Wheel Of Time novels, but there are no more similarities other than his name.

Required files:
Apachii Sky Hair (Male V 1.1) || http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

Not required but recommended: 
Fine Face Textures by Urshi || http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815/
Better Males Sundracon meshes by Urshi || http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26145
High Quality Eyes by Xenius || http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/498

Installation: (Manually)
1. Download and extract.
2. Locate the Skyrim directory and drop the files into the \'Data\' folder.
3. Check the .esp and enjoy!

Installation: (NMM)
1. Well you probably already know what to do, so get to it!

Uninstall:
1. Uncheck the .esp file.
2. Delete the .esp from the \'Data\' folder in the Skyrim Directory!

Troubleshooting:
So far I have only encountered one problem which is sometimes, he will not be at the Bannered Mare.
It\'s not really that major, it\'s just a teeny tiny issue.
It can be fixed by opening the console window with ~ or ` , then typing in \'help thor\'* (without quotation marks). Then, next to his name should be a series of numbers, all you need to do then is type in \'player.placeatme #\' (replace the # with the series of numbers) hopefully he\'ll then pop up right next to you when you close the console window!

*yes just \'thor\' because it doesn\'t work as well if you put in \'al\'thor\', probably because of the wee quotation mark in his name
Sorry if it\'s not that clear, I suck at explaining stuff heh

Aaaaaaaaand if it still doesn\'t work then leave a comment and I\'ll try to figure something out!
author: Alida
